type: 随机事件（1转盘2厄运卡3+活动币4-活动币5飞跃格6小店99宝藏点）
trigger: 触发机制（1经过触发 2停驻触发）
params: 配置内容（转盘、厄运卡：{items=<<id;num;weight>;<...>>}这个格式中选一个；加减四叶草、飞跃格、商店：{num=相应的数or概率}；宝藏：(dist离几个格子；num随几个奖励）{dist=31; num=2; awards=<<id;num;weight>;<...>>}
name: 名字
Wheel of Fortune
desc: Randomly get a small reward when you stop on the grid
desc_tw: 停在格子上時可隨機獲得一個小獎勵

name: bad luck card
desc: Gain a small penalty when parking on a grid
desc_tw: 停在格子上時會獲得一個小懲罰

name: Explorer Medal+
desc: Get Explorer Medal +3 when you land on a grid
desc_tw: 停在格子上時將獲得探險者勳章+3

name: Explorer Medal -
desc: When stopping on the grid, the Explorer Medal -1 will be deducted
desc_tw: 停在格子上時得扣除探險者勳章-1

name: leap grid
desc: After stopping on the grid, you can move forward 3 grids
desc_tw: 停在格子上後還能再往前移動3格

name: shop
desc: You can buy a product once when you pass or stop on the grid
desc_tw: 途徑或停在格子上都能購買1次商品

name: treasure chest
desc: Passing or stopping on the grid will get super big rewards!
desc_tw: 途徑或停在格子上都將獲得超級大獎勵！
